scripts.health-check: node -e "const BinanceAPIManager = require('./utils/binanceApi.js'); require('dotenv').config({path: '.env.local'}); const api = new BinanceAPIManager({apiKey: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_BINANCE_API_KEY, apiSecret: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_BINANCE_API_SECRET, isTestnet: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_BINANCE_TESTNET === 'true'}); api.performHealthCheck().then(r => console.log('Health Score:', r.healthScore + '%', 'Status:', r.status));"
scripts.stress-test: node -e "const BinanceAPIManager = require('./utils/binanceApi.js'); require('dotenv').config({path: '.env.local'}); const api = new BinanceAPIManager({apiKey: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_BINANCE_API_KEY, apiSecret: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_BINANCE_API_SECRET, isTestnet: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_BINANCE_TESTNET === 'true'}); api.runStressTest(10, 1000).then(r => console.log('Stress Test Results:', r));"
